channel.title: Mining
channel.description: How would i go about adding mining? if there is a tut let me know, cuz i looked thru the tutorial section and didnt see anything about mining :s [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2008, 12:47:15 AM[/size][hr]please help, it looks as though my client has everything needed for mining, but when i click on a rock, nothing happens :(
